Wondrous Item - Uncommon

This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions (2 ft square, 4 ft deep). It can hold up to 500 lbs or 64 cubic feet. The bag weighs 5 lbs regardless of contents.


Action

Retrieving an item from the bag.


Properties

  • If overloaded, pierced, or torn, the bag is destroyed and its contents are scattered across the Astral Plane.

  • If turned inside out, its contents spill forth unharmed. The bag must be righted before reuse.

  • The bag contains enough air for 10 minutes of breathing, divided among the number of creatures inside.

  • Placing a Bag of Holding inside another extradimensional space (Handy Haversack, Portable Hole, etc.) instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Astral Plane. Any creature within 10 ft must succeed on [[/save STR 15]]{Strength Save (DC 15)} or be sucked into a random Astral Plane location. The gate then closes, one-way only.
